Pack.Title: Optional post office
Pack.Description: This widget uses Bring's Optional Post Office API to allow the user to choose their preferred post office. This is mainly intended for online shopping to allow the user to choose another post office than the one closest to their shipping address.

Install.Step: This widget depends on jQuery, so please add jQuery to your site first.

Add the Optional Post Office widget:

<script type="text/javascript" src="http://fraktguide.bring.no/fraktguide/js/utleveringsenhet-1.0.0.js"></script>
